title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Friday, 11 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: a £ 50,000 reward is being offered for information about the murder of notorious criminal john `` goldfinger '' palmer in south weald .
essex fire and rescue says it has been dealing with a series of deliberate fires in chelmsford overnight .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the week
text: that 's it from us at essex live this week - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back on monday from 08:00 with the latest news for the county .
have a great weekend .

documents.title: weather : dry with light winds overnight . remaining dry tomorrow
text: tonight will be dry with cloud , but also some clearer spells with light winds throughout , allowing mist or fog patches to develop and a patchy frost to form in places by dawn .
minimum temperature : 2c ( 36f ) .
tomorrow any fog will slowly lift and clear during the morning to leave a fine and dry day tomorrow with some sunny spells and light winds .
you can get the latest forecast here .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: yellow weather warning issued over fog
text: the met office has issued a yellow weather warning for fog overnight in essex .
fog patches are expected to form in the early hours of saturday , becoming dense in some places .
drivers are being warned about possible travel disruption and difficult driving conditions .

documents.title: headlines : sixteen suspected illegal immigrants arrested in halstead assistance dog attacked in clacton
text: here are the top stories from essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: sixteen suspected illegal immigrants arrested in halstead
text: a total of 16 people have been arrested on sus of immigration offences after they were found in a lorry in halstead .
essex police says the ten men and six women were discovered inside the vehicle , which was parked on the bluebridge industrial estate yesterday after reports of voices coming from inside .
the force says the group will now be handed over to immigration enforcement officers .

documents.title: assistance dog requires stitches after staffordshire bull terrier attack
text: an assistance dog has been left with puncture wounds in his chest after he was attacked by a staffordshire bull terrier in clacton .
kubuli , a black labrador , was walking with his owner , who uses a wheelchair , on monday in langham drive when he was bitten by the brownish-coloured dog .
tendring district council says it is working with the police to trace the staffordshire bull terrier 's owner - who apologised before running off .
kubuli required five stitches and a course of antibiotics .

documents.title: your a view along holland-on-sea seafront
text: thanks to alan conran who emailed us this great photo from holland-on-sea this afternoon .
it 's a nice sunny afternoon in essex - we 'll bring you a full weather forecast a bit later .
in the meantime feel free to email us or tweet us any of essex you 'd like to show off .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex weekend football preview
text: sadly there are no essex teams in the fa cup this weekend - however there is still plenty of action from our sides in the county .

documents.title: no charges for men arrested over grays death
text: five men arrested after a man died in grays last month have been told they 'll face no further police action
officers were investigating after kane reading , 27 , was found with serious injuries on the thurrock trade park on 7 february .
it was thought he 'd been involved in a road crash while riding a quad bike .

documents.title: crimewatch reconstruction of the shooting of john 'goldfinger ' palmer
text: if you missed last night 's crimewatch , you 're able to see the reconstruction of the shooting of john 'goldfinger ' palmer below .
a £ 50,000 reward is being offered for information about the 65-year-old 's murder .

documents.title: more than 6,000 motorists caught not wearing a seat belt in essex
text: more than 6,000 motorist were caught not wearing a seat belt in essex last year , new figures have revealed .
essex police say many people are still putting their lives at risk by not buckling up - 50 years since the first law on wearing seat belts was passed .
nationally , more than 3.3 million drivers were caught in 2015 .

documents.title: your daffodils in tiptree heath
text: you 'd think it was summer looking at this from bbc weather watcher , judy .
she sent it to us from tiptree heath - and it 's a little less overcast there than it is here in chelmsford .
if you 'd like to submit a great of essex , you can drop us an email or a tweet .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: gp hits out over £ 2.5m scanner lying idle for 18 months
text: a gp has called for the nhs bosses who presided over a political wrangle , which has kept a £ 2.5m scanner mothballed for 18 months , to be sacked .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: weather : dry but cloudy , with some sunny spells
text: this afternoon will be cloudy with some bright or sunny spells developing in places .
feeling slightly cooler than yesterday although winds remaining light through the day .
maximum temperature : 8c ( 46f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest weather for essex here .

documents.title: headlines : ronald king denies care home murder essex sign australian bowler matt dixon
text: here are the top stories for essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex cricket sign australian fast bowler matt dixon
text: essex county cricket club have signed australian fast bowler matt dixon on a two-year deal .
the 23-year-old , who holds a british passport , will be available to play across all three formats .
the right arm fast bowler has played for the australia u17s & u19s in his short career to date .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: police have 'number of new leads ' following 'goldfinger ' crimewatch appeal
text: police investigating the murder of convicted conman john `` goldfinger '' palmer say they 've had a number of new leads following a crimewatch appeal last night .
the 65-year-old was found dead in his back garden in june last year .
officers say the killing had `` all the hallmarks '' of a professional hit .
det ch insp stephen jennings said the force had a `` really positive response '' from the public , but are still appealing for more information .

documents.title: walton care home murder investigation : timeline of events
text: here 's what we know about the de le mer house shooting to date :

documents.title: pensioner ronald king 'looked frail ' at murder plea hearing
text: pensioner ronald king looked frail as he entered chelmsford crown court on crutches today .
he was helped by two prison officers and told he could remain seated during the 10 minute hearing .
he wore a grey coat and top as he pleaded not guilty to murdering his wife .
author: Gareth George
BBC Look East

documents.title: ronald king remanded in custody after denying wife 's murder
text: ronald king has been remanded in custody after he denied murdering his wife at her care home .
during a brief hearing , which lasted 10 minutes , the 86-year-old of cedar close , walton-on-the-naze , spoke only to confirm his name and enter his plea .
mr king will stand trial on 4 july .
there was no application for bail .
author: Gareth George
BBC Look East

documents.title: ronald king , 86 , pleads not guilty to murdering wife
text: an 86-year-old man accused of shooting dead his wife at a care home in walton-on-the-naze has pleaded not guilty .
ronald king was charged with murder after the death of rita king , 81 , at the de la mer house last december .
the pensioner entered the plea at chelmsford crown court a short while ago .

documents.title: breakingronald king pleads not guilty to murdering wife in care home
text: an 86-year-old man accused of shooting dead his wife in a walton-on-the-naze care home last year has pleaded not guilty .
more details to follow .

documents.title: two essex villages named in best places to live guide
text: as we know , essex is an area of outstanding beauty , and now two of our county 's villages have been named among the best places to live in the east of england .
finchgfield and terling were selected for the sunday times top 10 shortlist for their positive community spirit , good local shops and attractive outdoor areas .
it was the small suffolk town of orford that was crowned the eventual winner for the region .

documents.title: chelmsford deliberate car fire damage revealed
text: this is one of the five vehicles destroyed in what essex fire and rescue is calling a deliberate spate of car fires in chelmsford last night .
all the incidents happened in the melbourne area of the city .
one eyewitness told bbc essex he thought somebody was having a `` late night bonfire '' .

documents.title: cctv shows moments before john 'goldfinger ' palmer 's death
text: cctv has been released by police of notorious criminal john `` goldfinger '' palmer , moments before he was shot dead at his home in south weald .
the footage was filmed at 17:18 - he was found 12 minutes later collapsed in his garden .
palmer 's family are offering a reward of £ 50,000 for information about the 65-year-old 's murder , following an appeal on bbc crimewatch last night .

documents.title: five cars 'deliberately ' set alight in chelmsford last night
text: five cars have been deliberately set alight in chelmsford overnight , essex fire and rescue says .
the vehicles were all destroyed in the space of an hour , starting in saint nazaire road at about 19:50 .
police attended each incident , and there are no reports of any injuries .

documents.title: weather : a foggy start for some , but brighter this afternoon
text: after a chilly and perhaps foggy start , it will be a dry day with some bright or sunny spells .
feeling slightly cooler than yesterday although winds remaining light through the day .
maximum temperature : 8c ( 46f ) .
stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .

documents.title: john 'goldfinger ' palmer murder : £ 50,000 reward offered
text: a £ 50,000 reward has been offered for information about the murder of notorious essex criminal john `` goldfinger '' palmer .
it 's thought the 65-year-old was targeted by a hitman when he was shot dead at his home in south weald in june last year .

on bbc crimewatch last night , palmer 's partner , cristina ketley appealed somebody to come forward with information , adding : `` there is someone out there who is prepared to assassinate someone '' .

documents.title: headlines : 'goldfinger ' murder £ 50,000 reward offered overnight 'deliberate ' chelmsford car fires
text: here are the top stories for essex this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning and welcome to essex live .
until 18:00 we 'll be bringing you all the latest news for the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
